# Pattern: Reference introduction

> Scaffold for reference articles (information-oriented). Copy, adapt, and delete the placeholder comments.

```markdown
# API/Tool/Feature Reference

> Technical summary in one sentence

## Table of Contents
[...]

## Overview

Brief description of purpose and scope.

**Availability:** [Version/plan requirements]
**Related:** [Links to related references]
```

---

**Source:** Diátaxis — reference documentation is information-oriented. See `article-writing.instructions.md` for voice and formatting rules.
